ComicInfo.Penciller: Pete Woods,Shannon Eric Denton,Shannon Denton,Shannon Denton,Pete Woods
ComicInfo.Summary: The Drowning Man Part 1 or Things to Do in Iowa When You're Deadpool: With his sanity slipping, Deadpool hits the road with Weasel in search of Siryn. Instead, he finds T-Ray who sets a time and a date for their final showdown. He also encounters Zoe who warns him to stay away from T-Ray and certain death. When he finally catches up with Siryn in Iowa (at the "Field of Dreams" baseball field, no less), he has to punch his way through Warpath to get to her. Teresa gets mad at the violence and the jokes and ditches him. But later that night, after Deadpool has drowned his sorrows in scads of beer, she returns to the baseball diamond and the two get it on.
ComicInfo.Tags: Warpath,Siryn,Zoe Culloden,Blind Al,Deuce,San Francisco,Typhoid Mary,Germany,Deadpool,the Devil Dog,Chicago,California,Patch,Landau,Luckman,Weasel,Gerry,Iowa,T-Ray,and Lake
ComicInfo.Title: The Drowning Man Part 1 or Things to Do in Iowa When You're Deadpool
